pages.text: A few additional options for movement are available in $(thing)Bliss:$()$(br)$(li)Pressing $(thing)C$() will allow you to $(thing)go prone$(), making you take up only one block.$(li)$(thing)Sneaking$() while next to a block will have you $(thing)wall grab$(), falling slowly as long as you're next to the wall.

pages.title: Wall Jumps
pages.text: Jumping while $(thing)wall grabbing$() will do a $(thing)wall jump$(), which can go up to 3 blocks high!
